title: Interoperability Strategies for Implementing a Federated Educational Digital Repository

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course on establishing and operating practice-oriented repository alliances for working professional learners

learning_goals: Explain metadata integration strategies using open standard specifications such as IEEE LOM and IMS DRI
Design and implement a federated architecture for diverse educational digital repositories
Propose a plan to improve the reuse rate of science education materials by over 30% through enhanced interoperability between repositories

resources: PlanetDR Architecture Case Study Analysis Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
